> Sunhawk:  He's in stasis you moron he can't just wake
> up, we need to revive him back at the base.  Besides
> the way he was shouting at me I think he's even
> stupider than you if that's possible and would NOT
> come quietly.
>

{Grimlock}

    "Grimlock not moron!" Grimlock growled as he turned away from the downed
pred to speak into his comm, "Me Grimlock say no one asked stupid bird bots
opinion. Me Grimlock know what I'm doing and me Grimlock not labour bot,
Grimlock king! Grimlock say pred bot wake up, or me Grimlock gonna munch
metal!"

    Turning back towards Inferno he proceeds his rather heavy handed (or
footed) way of attempting to wake up the downed pred.
